646800.name: World to the West - A Motorland Tale Comic Book
646800.description:
Motorland Tale is the story of how the boy Knaus gets himself into the expedition to the moon that leaves him crashlanded and confused in the land of World to the West.
This 20 page comic takes place in Motorland. The only nation in the world that knows how to make coal and steam work for them to build a true nation of industry, efficiency and mass production.
Unfortunately the hunger of this industrial machine drives the nation ever onward in their never ending quest of securing more resources for the gluttonous furnaces, and oft time morals and other such concerns can be put to the wayside for the needs of the nation and it's barons of industry.
